
************
Installation
************

----
Make
----

-------------------
Development Version
-------------------


------------
Dependencies
------------

UndersmoothedUnfolding requires the following dependencies:

- `ROOT <https://root.cern.ch/>`_ >= 2.7 or >= 3.4
- `TUnfold <http://www.desy.de/~sschmitt/tunfold.html/>`_
